name: Little Dungeon
description:
Little Dungeon is a top-down 2D shoot 'em up game. Set in a dungeon, blast your way through ghouls and fiendish goons and talk to helpful NPCs who will help guide your way. 

This game was made for the Community Game Jam 2019. We had a deadline, like any game jam of course, and we tried to go by it. However, what we had accomplished was only short of a polished game. So here I present to you, in it's unfinished form, our pride and joy: Little Dungeon.
